Haptic Effects

Classes

class  cEffectMagnet
 cEffectMagnet models the reaction force on a tool located near a magnet field. More...
class  cEffectStickSlip
 cEffectStickSlip models a stick and slip effect. More...
class  cEffectSurface
 cEffectSurface models the reaction force of on tool pushing against the surface of an object. More...
class  cEffectVibration
 cEffectVibration models force vibrations by defining a frequency and amplitude. More...
class  cEffectViscosity
 cEffectViscosity models the reaction force of a tool moving through a viscous environment. More...
class  cGenericEffect
 cGenericEffect provides a base class to program haptic effects (force models) when a virtual tool interacts with objects of a virtual environment. More...
